title: Dispatch Fuel Truck to Retail Station
description: A dispatcher receives a low inventory alert from a gas station and must dispatch a fuel truck to prevent a stock-out.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the low inventory alert for unleaded gasoline at station #5432.
Find the nearest available truck and check that it has enough of the required fuel grade.
tasks.expected_outcome: An available and suitable truck is identified.

tasks.description: Create a delivery order and dispatch the truck to the retail station.
tasks.expected_outcome: The truck is dispatched with the correct order details.
